StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPersonByShipId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@ShipId int)
AS
SELECT p.* FROM [dbo].[SHIPPER] s INNER JOIN [dbo].[CONTRACT] c ON c.[CONTRACT_ID] = s.[CONTRACT_ID] INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] n ON n.[NWA_ID] = c.[NWA_ID] INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] p ON p.[PERSON_ID] = n.[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] WHERE s.[SHIP_ID] = @ShipId
